v.title: Most significant bit
v.content: This bit (which we have chosen to depict as "V") determines whether the remaining 15 bits of input denote an address instruction or a computation.

d1.title: Destination
d1.content: A: Store result in register A (in CPU).

d2.title: Destination
d2.content: D: Store result in register A (in CPU).

d3.title: Destination
d3.content: M[A]: Store result in memory at address specified in register A.
